title: Elevators, Clubroom & Lounge with Fireplace, Controlled Access/Gated
posting_body: ['One Observatory Park', '2360 East Evans Avenue , Denver, CO, 80210', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 76', 'OR Text', '76', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'LUXE LOOKS GOOD ON YOU', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 845 Sq.', 'Ft.', "One Observatory Park is nestled in the heart of one of South Denver's most sought-after neighborhoods, offering enhanced studio, one- and two-bedroom apartment homes.", 'The building features an impressive eleven stories of luxe living opportunities and an array of amenities to complement the first-class lifestyle found within.', 'Features', '- Maple Wood Flooring in Kitchen & Living Areas', '- Electronic Key Systems', '- Kitchen Islands', '- Private Balconies & Juliettes', '- Berber Carpet in Bedrooms', '- Large Walk-in & Walk-Through Closets', '- Storage Spaces Available on Every Floor', '- Pendant Lighting & Modern Fixtures', '- Built-in Desks with Granite Tops', '- Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances', '- 10- to 11-Foot Ceilings', '- Energy Efficient Washers & Dryers', '- Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms', '- Panoramic Views of Rocky Mountains & Downtown', '- Granite Countertops', '**Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Bike Repair Room', '- Rooftop Deck', '- Self-Guided Tours Available', '- Cyber Café & Lounge', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Ample Bicycle Storage', '- Complimentary Wi-Fi on Amenity Deck', '- 24-Hour Health & Fitness Hub', '- Peloton Bikes in the Fitness Center', '- Resort Style Pool', '- Clubroom & Lounge with Fireplace', '- Spa', '- Separate Retail & Residential Parking', '- Elevators', '- Located Next to the Historic University of Denver Campus', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly.', 'zan4TsGe']
